categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Battle of Kalinda took place in the Kalinda system during the Galactic Civil War, in the times following the Battle of Endor. An Imperial task force consisting of the 2391st Battle Squadron, the 6783rd Troop Line and the Imperial Army's 1249th Mobile Corps moved to conquer the Kalinda system. They were intercepted by the Kalindan System Defense Force and the Kalindan Deep Space Fleet.
